title: Ticket #1950: startd can core dump when leaving preempting state
description:
We observed startd crashes on CHTC while beta testing the v7.5.6 release. This bug may have existed for a long time before v7.5.6 however.

StartLog is below. Problem was leave_preempting_state() deleted the job ad (r_cur) since the starter is gone, and then later on eval_expr() tried to dereference it while evaluating IS_OWNER. Since IS_OWNER should not need to reference job ad attributes, the patch simply makes eval_expr() evaluate solely in the context of the machine ad if the job ad has already been destroyed.
